member.name: D3D10_TEXCUBE_ARRAY_SRV1
member.summary: Specifies the subresource(s) from an array of cube textures to use in a shader-resource view.

member.name: D3D10_TEXCUBE_ARRAY_SRV1.MostDetailedMip
member.summary: Index of the most detailed mipmap level to use; this number is between 0 and MipLevels.

member.name: D3D10_TEXCUBE_ARRAY_SRV1.MipLevels
member.summary: Number of mipmap levels to use.

member.name: D3D10_TEXCUBE_ARRAY_SRV1.First2DArrayFace
member.summary: Index of the first 2D texture to use.

member.name: D3D10_TEXCUBE_ARRAY_SRV1.NumCubes
member.summary: Number of cube textures in the array.
